questions.question: Which is not a condition of a candidate key?

choices.answer: An attribute(s) that uniquely identifies a row in a relation
Each non-key field is functionally dependent on the candidate key
A candidate key can have null values in its attributes
One of the candidate keys will become the primary key
False
True
